response.overview: Filmed in Israel and Palestine during the 2023-24 genocide, the documentary presents the events in Israel and Palestine (both Gaza and the West Bank), as well as the movement and the oppression of the anti-occupation/ anti-Zionist Israelis, with the parallel narrative of Sahar Vardi, an Israeli activist in Jerusalem and conscientious objector, who was imprisoned for refusing to serve in the Israeli army.
response.title: Shalom - Salaam - Peace
